/* Rohit Kumar Jha */

#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>
#include <math.h>
#include <vector>
#include <string>
#include <map>
#include <set>
#include <queue>
#include <algorithm>
#define lli long long int
#define gc getchar//_unlocked
#define mod 1000000007
#define pii pair<int,int>

using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,i,j,l,n,m;
    string str;
    cin>>t;
    while(t-->0)
    {
        cin>>str;
        l=str.size();
        int cnt[26]={0};
        for(i=0;i<l;i++){
            cnt[str[i]-'a']++;
        }
        vector<pii> vec;
        for(i=0;i<26;i++){
            if(cnt[i]>0)vec.push_back(make_pair(i,cnt[i]));
        }
        n=vec.size();
        int dp[26],ans=-1,curr=9999999;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++){
            dp[i]=1;
            for(j=0;j<i;j++){
                if(vec[j].second<=vec[i].second && dp[i]<dp[j]+1){
                    dp[i]+=1;
                }
            }
            ans=max(ans,dp[i]);
        }

        /*for(i=0;i<n;i++){
            cout<<vec[i].first<<"  "<<dp[i]<<endl;
        }
        */
        vector<int> out;
        j=0;m=ans;
        while(j<m){
            for(i=0;i<n;i++){
                if(dp[i]==ans && vec[i].second<=curr){
                    out.push_back(vec[i].first);
                    curr=vec[i].second;
                    ans--;
                    j++;
                    break;
                }
            }
        }
        reverse(out.begin(),out.end());
        for(i=0;i<m;i++){
            char ch=char(out[i]+'a');
            printf("%c",ch);
        }
        cout<<endl;
    }

    return 0;
}
